meta.content: Laveen schools serve grades preschool - 8th. Each Laveen school offers a signature program. Laveen is home to three A+ Schools of Excellence.

li.a: Laveen Schools Are Now Enrolling for 2020-21.

span.p: All Laveen schools are currently enrolling students for the 2020-21 school year. Check out our new online registration portal at www.laveenschools.org/registration. Using our online system, families will be able to complete necessary forms and submit for enrollment.Within the portal …

Estrella Foothills Global Academy is an International Baccalaureate Candidate School

span.p: Estrella Foothills Global Academy is a candidate school* for the International Baccalaureate (IB) Middle Years Programme and pursuing authorization as an IB World School. IB World Schools share a common philosophy—a commitment to improve the teaching and learning …

div.a: All News
All Events
LEARN WHY

div.p: Located in the southwest valley, the Laveen Elementary School District serves over 7,000 students in grades kindergarten through eighth across eight schools. Laveen offers a complete curriculum that is aligned to the Arizona College and Career Ready Standards. Laveen is proud of its 1:1 student to computing device ratio to further support student achievement. In addition to offering art, PE, and music, each of our eight schools offer a spotlight program that further meets the needs of their students. Find out more on our “Choose Laveen” page.
See what makes each of Laveen's 8 great schools outstanding.
